answers.answer: I posted that website because that's what shows up on my browser.Try this one which may be the right one to start with untila person is regsistered with them.http://www.joslin.harvard.edu/managing/discussion.shtmlSorry for the extra step ...

clbear, it looks like you were already helped but please don't forget about the www.diabetes.org website also. It is not uncommon for someone with Type 2 diabetes to start out being controlled with  diet and exercise alone, then take oral meds and finally end up on insulin.CD
